name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Glimpse: Toggle Password with Shortcut Keys

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show / hide password fields easily with shortcut keys or context menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Not all websites provide the option to toggle the visibility of the inputted passwords. This may be frustrating when you think you have mistyped a letter.

Glimpse helps you to show / hide any password fields easily with shortcut keys (ALT + P) or context menu whenever you need it.

Glimpse works well with website where password toggling feature is available natively. To add on, you can access the same functions using the same Glimpse shortcut keys!

The shortcut key is also configurable via the chrome extensions shortcut menu.
